alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Muskogee; Wagoner (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 16 at 1:57AM CDT until April 16 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tulsa has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Wagoner County in northeastern Oklahoma... Central Cherokee County in east central Oklahoma... North central Muskogee County in east central Oklahoma... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 156 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Muskogee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. * Locations in or near the path include... Muskogee... Tahlequah... Fort Gibson... Okay... Hulbert... Tullahassee... Eldon... Scraper... Sequoyah State Park... Lost City... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
